problem_text_cn: 如图,直线l_{1}∥l_{2}∥l_{3}于点A、B、C,直线DF分别交l_{1}、l_{2}、l_{3}于点D、E、F,AC与DF相交于点H,如果AB=5,BH=1,CH=2,那么\frac{EF}{DE}的值等于()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the line l_{N_0}∥ l_{N_1} ∥ l_{N_2} at points A, B, and C, the line DF intersects l_{N_3}, l_{N_4}, and l_{N_5} at points D, E, F, AC and DF intersect at point H, if AB = N_6, BH = N_7, CH = N_8, then the value of \frac EFDE is equal to ()
notes: 缺少平行线分线段成比例定理
